ht32f5xxxx_rtc.c File Reference

This file provides all the RTC firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_rtc.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define RPRE_MASK   (0xFFFFF0FF)

Functions

void RTC_DeInit (void)
 Deinitialize the RTC peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void RTC_ClockSourceConfig (RTC_SRC_Enum Source)
 Select the RTC timer clock source.
void RTC_LSILoadTrimData (void)
 Loads the LSI trim data.
void RTC_LSESMConfig (RTC_LSESM_Enum Mode)
 Select the LSE startup mode.
void RTC_LSECmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the LSE clock.
void RTC_CMPCLRCmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the compare match function.
void RTC_SetPrescaler (RTC_RPRE_Enum Psc)
 Configure the RTC prescaler.
u16 RTC_GetPrescaler (void)
 Return the RTC prescaler setting.
void RTC_Cmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the RTC timer.
u32 RTC_GetCounter (void)
 Return the counter value.
void RTC_SetCompare (u32 Compare)
 Configure the compare match value.
u32 RTC_GetCompare (void)
 Return the compare match value.
void RTC_WakeupConfig (u32 RTC_WAKEUP, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified wakeup source.
void RTC_IntConfig (u32 RTC_INT, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the specified interrupt source.
u8 RTC_GetFlagStatus (void)
 Return the RTC flags.
void RTC_OutConfig (RTC_ROWM_Enum WMode, RTC_ROES_Enum EventSel, RTC_ROAP_Enum Pol)
 Configure the RTC output function.
void RTC_OutCmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the RTC output.
FlagStatus RTC_GetOutStatus (void)
 Return the RTCOUT level mode flag.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the RTC firmware functions.
